contextId.occurrenceNote: Here "foundations" represents the whole temple. Alternate translation: "so that the whole temple will shake" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-synecdoche]])
contextId.glQuote: so that the foundations will shake

contextId.occurrenceNote: Here "heads" represents the whole person. Alternate translation: "Break the pillars so that the temple falls on all of the people and kills them" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-synecdoche]])
contextId.glQuote: Break them in pieces on all of their heads
